column2: Spark Networks SE operates as a holding company. The company is headquartered in Berlin, Berlin and currently employs 273 full-time employees. The firm is engaged in creating communities that help individuals form relationships with others. The Company’s brands include EliteSingles, JDate, Christian Mingle, eDarling, JSwipe and Attractive World. The firm also operates a number of other niche focused and international Websites and mobile applications. The Company’s segments include: Jewish Networks, which consists of JDate, JDate.co.uk, JDate.fr, JDate.co.il, Cupid.co.il, and JSwipe; Christian Networks, which consists of ChristianMingle, CrossPaths, ChristianMingle.co.uk, ChristianMingle.com.au, Believe.com, ChristianCards.net, DailyBibleVerse.com and Faith.com, and Other Networks, which consists of Spark.com and related other general market Websites as well as other properties which are primarily composed of sites targeted towards various religious, ethnic, geographic and special interest groups.
